title: LEGO DC Super-Villains + 10 DLCs
body:
LEGO DC Super-Villains + 10 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D
Companies: TT Games, Warner Bros.
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI14
Original Size: 18.4 GB
Repack Size: from 6.6 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG VO Only
  • Tapochek.net ENG VO Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and Avkhymovych, compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread LATER

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on LEGO.DC.Super.Villains.Shazam-CODEX ISO release: codex-lego.dc.super.villains.shazam.iso (19,805,110,272 bytes)
  • Unlike most of my repacks this one is 100% Lossless but NOT MD5 Perfect: game resources were unpacked
  • 10 DLCs are included and activated
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing of voice packs you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 18.4 to 6.6~10.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-30 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 31 GB (up to 36 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! The game uses very long filenames, so to avoid problems, install it to a VERY short path, like C:\LDC

Game Description

It’s good to be bad… Embark on an all-new DC/LEGO® adventure by becoming the best villain the universe has seen. Players will create and play as an all-new super-villain throughout the game, unleashing mischievous antics and wreaking havoc in an action-packed story. Set in an open world experience within the DC universe, the Justice League has disappeared, leaving Earth’s protection to their counterparts, who have proclaimed themselves as the “Justice Syndicate”. It’s up to you and a crazy group of misfits to uncover the intentions of Earth’s new, strange, wannabe superheroes. Joined by renowned DC Super-Villains: The Joker, Harley Quinn, and countless others from the Injustice League, players will set out on an epic adventure.

Included DLCs

  • Aquaman Movie Pack Part 1
  • Aquaman Movie Pack Part 2
  • Batman: The Animated Series
  • DC Movie Character Pack
  • DC Super Heroes: TV Character Pack
  • DC Super-Villains: TV Character Pack
  • Justice League Dark Character Pack
  • Shazam Movie Part 1
  • Shazam Movie Part 2
  • Young Justice

You can skip downloading of speech packs you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • fg-selective-english.bin (a MUST for English, Russian and other languages without their own voicepack)
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German language only – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-10).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous LEGO DC Super-Villains repack.
